law.catch_line: There is a Chesapeake Employers' Insurance Company....

text.section: There is a Chesapeake Employers' Insurance Company.

The Company shall be:
a private, nonprofit, nonstock corporation organized under State law; and
subject to the applicable provisions of the Corporations and Associations Article as a nonstock corporation.

Before October 1, 2013, the Company shall:
file articles of incorporation under the Corporations and Associations Article; and
take all steps necessary to be a private, nonprofit, nonstock corporation organized under State law.
